attributes.title: AWFUL! Spam!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay up to day with Trumps re-election campaign. The day after I logged in all my Information I began receiving at least 4 telemarketing calls a day!! I believe they sold my Information to these telemarketers. I’ve never been so angry with an app I’ve downloaded before. If I could leave a worse review I would.

attributes.title: My dog died bc of this app 😖
attributes.review: Immediately after opening the app they could tell I was a raging homosexual liberal🤬so they sent the secret service to my house, they shoved my mom to the ground and body slammed my dad. They kicked my dog. When they finally got to me they beat me up and called me a f*ggot. They then spit on me and my dog. Wish I could rate 0 stars. Now everytime I get ice cream my tongue turns blue and swells up

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could keep up to date with our commander in Cheeto and it was absolutely terrible. The app tried to send me a maga hat and tried to convince me that women don’t have the right to choose what happens to their own bodies. Then it started screaming all lives matter at me. It makes me want to hide in a bunker to keep safe.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING!!
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app and a big oompa loompa lookin fat cheeto came to my window!! 😱😱 then he threw rats through my window with his witch craft. then i ate some molded cheese that i guess was for the rats but i ate it and died 😵 moral of the story, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! it will haunt youuuuuu😰 better yet, don’t even VOTE for trump 🤢🤮i would give this negative stars if i could. dear
trump, ✨🧚🏽‍♀️💖 did you fall from heaven? next time, fall harder 💖✨🧚🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: this app took WEEKS to download. it messed up my phone and took up a lot of storage! When I finally was able to open it, it kept crashing, and then my phone kept bugging out again! I tried to delete but the app wouldn’t delete. I’m going to stick with Facebook for my daily Trump News 🤮🤮😓😓😓😭😭🤣😭

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: Trumps incompetence is really shown in such a a sugarcoated way ,we all know he won’t do what he says so why vote for him hoping this time it’ll be different. I’m just saying why would we want a president that promotes racism and homophobia? and let’s not forget he’s a sexual predator. So if any of you want to dismantle white supremacy I’m telling you that trump is not the candidate that will help.

attributes.title: Worst thing ever!!!!
attributes.review: When I went to open the app a gust of wind struck my shoulders. I could hear the screams of innocent children coming from the app. Even worse when I closed the app i looked up to realize that there was a orange figure in the corner of my room running at me. The figure struck me in the head and I woke up in a room with Kanye west getting beat by big orange man.

attributes.title: VERY UPSET!!!!!!
attributes.review: Yooooo Trump if your reading this, you better not get Tiktok off the App Store for America otherwise your gonna get a whole lot of hell coming your way. The only thing on tiktok that we do is make others laugh and for you to take that away from us is absolutely horrible. Us tiktokers are strong so you better get ready for the fury!!!! #KeepTikTok2020

attributes.title: Help. I’m scared.
attributes.review: After taking a month to download, the app overheated my phone. I then began hearing the orange talk to me even when the app was closed. I am scared. I fear that he hears what I’m saying at all times. At around 2 am I woke up to the orange singing the national anthem to me as I curled up and sobbed in horror. I have tried deleting the app, but it won’t let me. Trump, I am begging you, please let me go.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD! MY PHONE OVERHEATED AND CRASHED!!!!
attributes.review: This app is making my phone overheat! This orange Cheeto not only is ruining the lives of millions but whatever idiotic team members of his thought to create this app, is making things worse for our technology as well. Please do not mess up your phone Tehran deleting this. I’m telling you this is not worth trying to even see what this clown is doing.
